Fifth Street, Los Angeles, CA, 90013', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 98', 'OR Text', '98', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', "DOWNTOWN'S MOST REFINED HIGH-RISE LIVING EXPERIENCE", 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1033 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Park Fifth is a couture high-rise residence offering a truly cosmopolitan experience, accompanied by designer homes, a signature rooftop pool retreat, lavish amenities and tailored services.', 'A new icon is gracing the Angeleno skyline.', 'Features', '- Stainless-steel appliance suite', '- Sleek quartz counter-tops', '- Open-floor plans with floor-to-ceiling windows', '- Modern kitchens with islands*', '- Private balconies*', '- Built-in window shades', '- NEST thermostats', '- Front-loading washer and dryer', '- Gas Range', '- Posh bathrooms with quartz counter-tops and porcelain tile', '- Oak wood flooring', '- Spacious walk-in closets*', '- Studio, one, two and three-bedroom homes', '*Options may vary from home-to-home', 'Community Amenities', '- Fire-side lounge seating', '- Gas Barbecues', '- Cabanas', '- Bike repair area', '- Fitness-on-demand', '- Yoga and pilates studio', '- Clubhouse with bar, kitchen and pool table', '- 24hr State-of-the-art fitness center with cardio', '- On-site resident concierge services', '- Two separate amenity levels', '- Dog walk', '- Lush courtyard perfect for social gatherings and nooks', '- Dog washing station', '- Resort-style, infinity-edge pool', '- Hot tub', '- Valet Parking Available', '- Onsite retail', '- Weight room', '- Controlled-access bike storage', '- Rooftop deck featuring 360 degree views of Downtown LA', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets Welcome!', '(Up to two pets per home)', 'Income Requirements:', 'Household gross income must be 3x the rental amount', 'Greystar California, Inc., Broker License #01525765', 'DMCA Agent: <URL>', 'Hvxjyg3umA']
